map
Class DrawMap 

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--map.DrawMap
public class DrawMap
extends java.lang.Object

这个类是用来绘制砖块贴图.

Example:

Graphics g; int[][] mapData; int[][] subImage;

DrawMap d = new DrawMap(img,mapData,subImage);

d.paint(g);

Author: wangquan
Version: 1.0

void initLayer() 建立内存上的画布.
void paint(Graphics g) 绘制地图.
void drawSubImage(Graphics g,int x,int y,int[] subImage) 裁减绘制地图.
